img.data-fbpg-desc: The Tahquamenon Education Foundation recognized the achievements of the Class of 2019.

td.p: Linked below is a list of some online resources available to students and parents during our school closing. These are free recourses for parents and students. Login or redeem information is included for those sites that would normally require a subscription.
Free access to Michigan Virtual course content during school closures for students in Grades 6-12. Over 70 high-quality online courses FREE to parents as a resource to supplement student learning.

ul.li: Breakfast is available to all students at no cost.

hr.p: Tahquamenon Area Schools participates in the Community Eligibility Program. This program provides breakfast and lunch at no cost for all students.

div.span: Share an idea, make a comment, ask a question, report a problem, or tell us what is on your mind.
